title: Biden debate flop leads Democrats to call for new nominee — but replacing him is tough to do
content: President Joe Biden emerged bruised from his first presidential debate with Donald Trump, raising fears about his age and ability to serve another term.
summary: President Joe Biden emerged bruised from his first presidential debate with Donald Trump, raising fears about his age and ability to serve another term.

title: Nike CEO John Donahoe comes under fire from Wall Street after lackluster performance
content: Nike's CEO John Donahoe has helmed the sneaker giant for nearly five years, but under his watch, its stock has underperformed and its lost market share.
summary: Nike's CEO John Donahoe has helmed the sneaker giant for nearly five years, but under his watch, its stock has underperformed and its lost market share.

title: France's election has the ability to rock wider European stocks, Citi strategist says
content: The stock market has not priced in a far-right or far-left majority, according to Citi.

title: Warren Buffett gives away another $5.3 billion, says his children will manage his estate
content: Warren Buffett on Friday made his biggest annual donation to date, giving $5.3 billion worth of Berkshire Hathaway shares to five charities.
summary: Warren Buffett on Friday made his biggest annual donation to date, giving $5.3 billion worth of Berkshire Hathaway shares to five charities.

title: 'Biden stumbles, Trump lies': How the global media reacted to the presidential debate

title: Fed and European Central Bank could cut interest rates in September, Morgan Stanley strategist says
content: The U.S. Federal Reserve and European Central Bank could move to cut rates in September, a Morgan Stanley strategist said Friday.

title: France's far right looks headed for victory in the first round at the polls. Here's what that means
content: With just days to go until France's snap parliamentary election kicks off, victory for the far right looks increasingly likely in the first phase of the two-stage runoff.

title: Apple's Vision Pro starts deliveries at a higher price in China than in the U.S.
content: Apple's mixed-reality headset began deliveries in China on Friday with a retail price 18% higher than in the U.S.

title: Here are the 10 most livable cities in the world — and Europe dominates the list
content: Vienna, Copenhagen and Zurich topped the list for the most livable cities in the world, according to EIU's 2024 Global Liveability Index.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: The humble onion could be holding India's economy hostage
content: Even a modest change in the price of the bulbous vegetable soon becomes the talking point around dinner tables for hundreds of millions of people in the country.

title: DJT shares pull back after sharp rise following Biden stumble in Trump debate

title: 'Alarmingly high': E.coli levels discovered in River Thames ahead of famous regatta

title: Iran votes for its new president amid economic strife, crackdowns and regional war

title: Younger generations of Asians are spending big on art
content: More than 40% of Sotheby's contemporary art buyers in Asia are millennials. While the size of the global art market fell last year, sales in China were up 9%.
summary: More than 40% of Sotheby's contemporary art buyers in Asia are millennials. While the size of the global art market fell last year, sales in China were up 9%.

title: China is testing the limits of a critical U.S.-Philippines defense pact — will Washington respond?

title: Chinese smartphone maker Honor says AI's power is 'worthless' without data privacy

title: Nike shares plunge after retailer says quarterly sales will fall 10%, warns on China weakness

title: Onboard forests, street markets and reefs: Disney releases details about its new cruise in Singapore

title: IMF says Fed should hold interest rates where they are until 'at least' end of year

title: JPMorgan Chase says its stress test losses should be higher than what the Fed disclosed
